title: SH 114 Roanoke Main Lane Construction

pageHeader.title: SH 114 Roanoke Main Lane Construction
pageHeader.lastUpdated: Created April 18, 2023. Last updated May 24, 2024 (add two photos)

text: In April 2023 bids were opened for construction of 2 miles of main lanes west of Roanoke to east of I-35W. Low bid was $107 million.

images.caption: This zoomed-in view looks east at Dale Earnhardt-Cleveland Gibbs road in April 2023, prior to the start of construction.
This wide view looks east at Dale Earnhardt-Cleveland Gibbs road in April 2023, prior to the start of construction.
Construction of the overpass for Litsey Road/Briarwyck Parkway
Construction of the overpass for Litsey Road/Briarwyck Parkway
